targets.rawSql:
-- grafana ignore
SELECT
  relname as table,
  least((SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'autovacuum_freeze_max_age') - age(relfrozenxid), 
        (SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age') - mxid_age(relminmxid))
        tx_before_wraparound_vacuum,
  pg_stat_get_last_autovacuum_time(c.oid) AS last_autovacuum,
  age(relfrozenxid) AS xid_age,
  mxid_age(relminmxid) AS mxid_age
FROM
  pg_class c
WHERE
  c.relname in ('ethereum_blocks', 'eth_call_cache','subgraph_deployment')
  and c.relfrozenxid != 0
SELECT left(ds.shard, 20) shard, count(ds.id) "all", count(a.id) assigned from deployment_schemas ds left outer join subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment a on a.id = ds.id group by 1 order by 1

-- grafana ignore
SELECT
  left(n.nspname || '.' || c.relname, 25) as table,
  least((SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'autovacuum_freeze_max_age') - age(relfrozenxid), 
        (SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age') - mxid_age(relminmxid))
        tx_before_wraparound_vacuum,
  greatest(pg_stat_get_last_autovacuum_time(c.oid), pg_stat_get_last_vacuum_time(c.oid)) AS last_vacuum,
  c.relpages::numeric*8192 as table_size,
  c.reltuples as table_rows
  -- age(relfrozenxid) AS xid_age,
  -- mxid_age(relminmxid) AS mxid_age
FROM
  pg_class c, pg_namespace n
WHERE
  n.oid = c.relnamespace
  -- c.relname in ('event_meta_data', 'ethereum_blocks','ens_names','eth_call_cache')
  and c.relkind in ('r','m')
  and c.oid > 16384
  and (SELECT setting::int FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'autovacuum_freeze_max_age') < age(relfrozenxid)
  and c.relfrozenxid != 0

-- grafana ignore
select count(*) unused,
       (select count(*) from unused_deployments where removed_at is null) recorded,
       (select count(distinct deployment) from subgraphs.subgraph_version where created_at >= extract(epoch from now() - '24h'::interval)) "new (24h)",
       (select count(*) from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment where node_id like 'index_node_%') as "assigned",
       (select count(*) from deployment_schemas) total
  from deployment_schemas ds
 where not exists (select 1 from subgraphs.subgraph_deployment_assignment sda where ds.id=sda.id)
   and not exists (select 1 from subgraphs.subgraph_version v, subgraphs.subgraph s where ds.subgraph = v.deployment and v.id in (s.current_version, s.pending_version))
select sum(size) as size from pg_ls_waldir();

-- grafana ignore
select regexp_replace(regexp_replace(regexp_replace(coalesce(nullif(application_name,''), 'unknown'),
                      'query_node_[0-9a-f]+_', 'q-'),
                      'query_node_high_traffic_[0-9a-f]+_', 'h-'),
                      'index_node_(customer_)?', 'i-') as client,
       pid,
       extract(epoch from age(now(), query_start)) as age,
       extract(epoch from age(now(), xact_start)) as txn_age,
       format('%s'||chr(10)||'%s'||chr(10)||'block: %s', variadic (coalesce((select regexp_matches(query, '^/\*.*application=''([^'']+)'',route=''([^'']+)''.*action=''([^'']+)''.*\*/.*$')), array['ø', 'ø', 'ø']))) as qid,
       regexp_replace(query, '^/\* controller=''filter''.*? \*/', '') as query
  from pg_stat_activity
 where query not like '%grafana ignore%'
   and state='active'
   and coalesce(usename, 'none') != 'cloudsqlreplica'
   and query not like '[[autovacuum]]: %'
order by query_start desc

-- grafana ignore
select u.relname,
       u.n_live_tup, 
       u.n_dead_tup, 
       u.n_dead_tup::numeric/nullif(u.n_live_tup,0)::numeric as bloat_factor, 
       c.relpages,
       age(now(), greatest(u.last_autovacuum, u.last_vacuum))::text last_vacuum
  from pg_stat_user_tables u, pg_class c
 where u.schemaname in ('subgraphs','public')
   and u.relid = c.oid
   and u.n_dead_tup > 100

-- grafana ignore
select ac.src, 
       src.subgraph as src_subgraph,
       src.shard as src_shard,
       ac.dst,
       dst.subgraph as dst_subgraph,
       dst.shard as dst_shard,
       ac.queued_at,
       ac.cancelled_at 
  from active_copies ac,
       deployment_schemas src,
       deployment_schemas dst
 where ac.src = src.id
   and ac.dst = dst.id;

-- grafana ignore
SELECT  a.application_name,
        coalesce(extract(epoch from age(now(), a.xact_start)), 0) as age,
        l.relation::regclass,
        l.mode,
        l.GRANTED::varchar,
        l.locktype "Target",
        l.pid
FROM pg_stat_activity a
JOIN pg_locks l ON l.pid = a.pid
where pg_backend_pid() != a.pid
order by granted asc, age desc;

-- grafana ignore
select client_addr,
       application_name,
       usename,
       state,
       extract(epoch from age(now(), xact_start)) as age
  from pg_stat_activity
 where query not like '%grafana ignore%'
   and state like '%idle in transaction%'
order by query_start desc
